properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. Sal to Santa Cruz Island CA and westward 60 nm including San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal from 10 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 16 at 8:43PM PST until February 18 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
combined seas 8 to 12 feet when conditions are worst.

* WHERE...Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal from 10 to 60 NM
and Waters from Pt. Sal to Santa Cruz Island CA and westward
60 nm including San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 3 AM PST Monday. For the
Small Craft Advisory, from 3 AM Monday to 3 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will create dangerous sea conditions
which could capsize or damage small and large vessels.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST MONDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 3 AM PST TUESDAY
